attributes.action: Fix the term of a Parliament to four years only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should not have the option of calling elections every four or five years. The term of a parliament should be fixed to four years. This would prevent the government from going to the polls when it suits them or dragging out the term for another year if the polls are unfavourable. The current system has no benefit other than benefiting the sitting government.
